Class Application

java.lang.Object
functionalities.Application
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Application
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Application class containing all the necessary information for its correct use.
Author:
Martin Sanchez Signorini

      Method for calculating collectives affinity

      c2 - Collective 2
      Returns:
